title: 2 by 6 Bone straight
short_description: Silky bone-straight lace wig, natural sheen.
description:
Glam Straight Premium Lace Wig

100% Remy human hair. Available in multiple lengths. Pre-plucked hairline, medium density, heat friendly up to 180°C. Includes adjustable straps and combs.

  • Texture: Bone Straight
  • Density: 150%
  • Cap: 13x4 Lace Front
